item.title: ‘Open Letters’ from Experts Are Often Fact-Free Propaganda
item.description: Such letters are often theatrical versions of political position papers rather than any attempt to educate the public.

item.title: Lessons for Republicans from the Tory Collapse
Mississippi, Not California, Is the Education Future
item.description: With reading scores nationally sliding the wrong way, Mississippi and the other Southern states offer a beacon of hope.

item.title: A Russian Defeat in Ukraine Would Help the West Elsewhere
item.description: The struggle in Ukraine does not end at Europe’s borders. Its outcome shapes the balance of power in the Middle East and Asia.

item.title: The Trump Administration’s Tariff ‘Plan B’ Has an Ominous History
item.description: The White House is warning of a new Great Depression while invoking a statute that contributed to the original.
